channel.title: Dieing glitch
channel.description:
I have to make something like that that if a player dies then he would be directed back to the original 'home' point. Right now there is that if a player dies then he can't log on anymore.
I also need help with goswords because they don't work properly. If I hit with a godsword then I will automatically log off?!
Thanks, Kristjan*

item.title: Dieing glitch
item.dc:creator: @kristjan1 kristjan*
item.description:
@kristjan1 wrote:

Ok, it works but if you die then the screen stucks and you have to restart ‘silabsoft’ client. What do I have to do for it to automatically reconnect with the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Dieing glitch
item.dc:creator: @Booniex Booniex
item.description:
@Booniex wrote:

You need to find.

[center]sendMessage("Oh dear you died!");[/center]

Then above that add.

[center]teleportToX = ; teleportToY = ;[/center]

Read full topic
